name: Psionic_Dart
display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
display_target_help: Your attack speed has been reduced.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

name: Psionic_Lash
display_help: You channel energy into your whip and lash out at your foe, dealing high energy damage and causing fire damage over time. Lash has longer range than most melee attacks. It will reduce the target's damage resistance and also has a chance to knockdown your target.
display_short_help: Melee (Long), Moderate DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Fire), -Rech (Foe), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
display_target_help: You are on fire and burning. Your attack speed has also been reduced.

name: Psionic_Siphon
display_help: You hold your target with your psionic whip, preventing them from moving. While they helplessly tremble under your gaze, you are healed while they suffer psionic and fire damage over time. The affected target is also made highly resistant to healing.
display_target_help: You are resistant to healing.

name: Subdue
display_help: Using your own hyperactive mind, you lash out in an effort to subdue the weaker mind of your foes. This causes psionic damage and has the potential to immobilize your foes.
display_target_help: You have been immobilized!

name: Overload
display_help: You continuously remain hovering in a delicate psychic balance due to the traumas inflicted by Mother Mayhem and Malaise. When you are nearly defeated in combat, all control over this balance is lost, causing a powerful eruption of psionic energy that deals significant damage to your foes.
display_target_help: You have been hit by an explosion!

name: Psionic_Thrash
display_help: You create a whip of pure psionic energy and make an impressive sweep, causing psionic damage to enemies within a wide cone. Affected targets are seared by this attack and suffer additional fire damage over time. They also are unable to fly and suffer both reduced movement and attack speed. There is also a chance that affected targets will be knocked back.
display_short_help: Melee (Long Cone), Moderate DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Fire), -Speed (Foe, All), Chance for Knockback (Foe)
display_target_help: You are on fire and burning. You are also unable to fly and both your movement and attack speeds are reduced.

name: Nullify_Pain
display_help: Nullify Pain will heal nearby allies for some hit points by numbing the pain caused by their wounds. Nullify Pain is not as potent as Soothe, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

display_help: You hack your target with a blade formed from within your mind. This manifested blade causes psionic damage and leaves injuries that cause additional lethal damage over time. The target also suffers a reduction in their attack speed, chance to hit, regeneration and recovery. The target may also be taunted to attack you if they are not already doing so.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Psionic), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -Rech(Foe), -ToHit(Foe), -Regen(Foe), -Rec(Foe), Chance for Taunt(Foe)

name: Metabolic_Superiority
display_help: Your mind exerts an extremely powerful hold over your body, naturally increasing your regeneration rate, attack speed and chance to hit. Moreover, your force of will makes attacks that would reduce these attributes or your movement speeds less effective.

name: Mental_Breakdown
display_help: You create a powerful illusion in the minds of your targets, causing them to become rapidly hyperstressed. This causes a cascading reaction in the mind that causes psionic damage. The effects of this reaction linger, causing additional psionic damage over time. Additionally, affected targets suffer reduced regeneration, recovery and healing effectiveness. Finally, the endorphins released within your own body as the success of your attack heal you.
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Psionic), -Regen(Foe), -Rec(Foe), +RES(Foe, Heal), Heal(Self)
display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time. Additionally, your regeneration, recovery and healing effectiveness have been reduced.

name: Mind_Siphon
display_help: You gradually siphon the minds of all those around you. The longer they remain close to you, the worse this becomes, until they become confused.
display_target_help: The Awakened is siphoning control of your mind. The longer you remain in its presence, the more under its control you fall. Eventually, you will succumb and be confused for 10 seconds. After the Mind Siphon takes effect, however, you will be immune to its effects for a brief period of time.

name: Psionic_Crush
display_help: You imprison your target in a field of collapsing psionic energy. They are held in place and suffer continuous damage and endurance loss.
display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and losing endurance!

name: Psionic_Torment
display_help: You create painful visions within the mind of your target, causing psionic damage. These visions manifest as wounds that cause lethal damage over time. Affected targets also suffer reduced regeneration, recovery and attack speed.
display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time. Additionally, your regeneration, recovery and attack speed have been reduced.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} creates unrelenting torment within your mind, causing {Damage} points of psionic damage and reducing your regeneration, recovery and attack speed.
You suffer an additional {Damage} points of psionic damage due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.
Your mind makes the pain of {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} real, causing {Damage} points of lethal damage.

name: Psionic_Drift
display_help: You induce a dream state in all nearby targets around you while also dealing continuous psionic damage. These dreams can manifest as nightmares, lucid dreams or deep sleep, which manifest as fear, confusion or stun.
display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Psionic), Stun/Fear/Confuse(Foe)
display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and are either feared, confused or stunned.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} causes your mind to be affected by {PowerName}, inducing mental incapacitation and causing {Damage} points of psionic damage!
You continue to suffer {Damage} points of psionic damage while your mind is trapped in a {PowerName}.

name: Psionic_Blade
display_help: You create a blade of crystalline psionic energy around your hand and use it to stab your target with a quick attack. The target suffers psionic damage, followed by a wound that causes lethal damage over time and reduced defense.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Psionic), Moderate DoT (Lethal), -Def(Foe, All)
display_target_help: Your defenses have been reduced.

name: Initial
display_help: You call forth a powerful stream of lightning from the highest reaches of the atmosphere. This Flow Lightning causes significant energy damage to all enemies caught in its field, as well as drains endurance and lowers recovery.
